definition: student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet

sentences.english: Some close-ups of cadets and instructors.
sentences.chinese: 以下是學員和指導員的特寫鏡頭。

sentences.english: All textbooks are compiled in English-Chinese edition to facilitate foreign learners.
sentences.chinese: 教材爲雙語版本，以國外學員角度編寫。

sentences.english: US Shaolin Fist Union students perform for tourists.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲美國少林拳法聯盟的學員爲遊客進行表演。

sentences.english: Those who have enrolled in credit-bearing courses offered under CAM will be issued a CAM student identity card.
sentences.chinese: 學分累積制的學員將獲發學生證作辨別身份之用。

sentences.english: Pay more attention to practical teaching to stimulate the students to learn for practice.
sentences.chinese: 重視實踐性教學，激勵學員學以致用。

sentences.english: There's a 10-minute time limit for students on trial at Hiknow. com.
sentences.chinese: 試聽的樂知學員有10分鐘的時間限制。

sentences.english: A Closing Ceremony will be held by Mandarin Class for all students and tutors.
sentences.chinese: 華文班將會在舉辦閉幕典禮給所有學員及教員。

sentences.english: PLKN participator queue up to bath Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 佛教徒國民服務學員排隊浴佛。

sentences.english: Members of the class committee and other trainees made up a cheering squad and shouted encouragement for the players.
sentences.chinese: 班委會成員與其他學員組成啦啦隊爲大家吶喊助威。

sentences.english: And the community school facilitates the aging learners.
sentences.chinese: 第三章社區老年學員自主學習現狀調查。

sentences.english: You will end up taking things out on your coachee and that is counter productive and unfair.
sentences.chinese: 這樣對你的學員來說是不公平的，而且會損害生產力。

sentences.english: When the Worker-Peasant-Soldier Student graduated, a lot of them were assigned to the original units or provinces where they had worked in.
sentences.chinese: 工農兵學員畢業後，多被分配到原單位或原省份工作。

sentences.english: Students and guests at the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 學員們和到場嘉賓在開學典禮上合影。

sentences.english: Each class will have no more than 5 students .
sentences.chinese: 每堂寫作班的學員不會超過5位。

sentences.english: Do the au pairs have medical insurance while in the United States?
sentences.chinese: 美國安親褓姆學員在美國是否有醫療保險？
軍校把三名學員除了名。

definition: to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
